name: Paraphrase Genius
title: Paraphrase Genius

api_list.name: Paraphrase
api_list.description: This is the default paraphrase endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://paraphrase-genius.p.rapidapi.com/dev/paraphrase/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "paraphrase-genius.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

url = "https://paraphrase-genius.p.rapidapi.com/dev/paraphrase/"
